items.title: Samsung expected to increase Galaxy A series prices in India
items.summary: The Galaxy A37 and A57 are expected to drop next month, and usually, the current models become more affordable. However, according to the latest tip, the company is planning to hike the prices of Galaxy A models in India by around INR 1,000. The Galaxy A56, on the other hand, will see its price go â€¦

items.title: Wembanyama returns to help Spurs to NBA Cup final
items.summary: Victor Wembanyama returns from injury for the San Antonio Spurs and helps them reach the NBA Cup final with a win against the Oklahoma City Thunder.

items.title: Why Sunderland v Newcastle means so much
items.summary: Sunderland and Newcastle United will meet in the Premier League on Sunday for the first time in nearly a decade as "two worlds collide".

items.title: Cordina closer to two-weight title dream after win
items.summary: Former super-featherweight world champion Joe Cordina should emerge as the WBO's number one lightweight contender after dominating Gabriel Flores Jr in California.

items.title: 'The game that really matters' - pundits on Tyne-Wear derby
items.summary: Football Focus pundits Stephen Warnock and Ashley Williams look ahead to Sunday's Tyne-Wear derby between Newcastle and Sunderland.

items.title: No batting changes for vital Ashes Test - McCullum
items.summary: Head coach Brendon McCullum says England are unlikely to make changes to their batting line-up for the crucial third Ashes Test in Adelaide.

items.summary: Last weekâ€™s poll ends with interesting results â€“ the Samsung Galaxy Z TriFold is surprisingly popular. Okay, the plurality of people is turned away by its price, but those people still find the form factor appealing. Add those who are willing to spend as much as necessary to get into the new form fâ€¦

items.title: OnePlus Open receives Android 16-based OxygenOS 16 update in North America
items.summary: The OnePlus Open received the Android 16-based OxygenOS 16 stable update in India and Europe last month, and now the rollout has expanded to North America. The foldable is receiving the OxygenOS 16.0.1.300 update in North America with firmware version CPH2551_16.0.1.300(EX01). The update introducesâ€¦

items.title: 'He's got to be careful' - Maresca gives targeted press conference
items.summary: Enzo Maresca's press conference raises questions over whether his comments are aimed at the Chelsea board.

items.title: Burden beats Bingham in Shoot Out for first ranking title
items.summary: Alfie Burden beats Stuart Bingham 63-8 to win the Snooker Shoot Out and claim his first ranking title in Blackpool.

items.title: Match of the Day
items.summary: Highlights from four Premier League matches, including Arsenal v Wolves.

items.title: Lim, 71, becomes oldest winner at World Championship
items.summary: Paul Lim becomes the oldest player to win a match at the PDC World Championship with a stunning victory over Jeffrey de Graaf.

items.title: Liverpool icon Rush recovering in hospital from flu
items.summary: Liverpool's all-time leading goalscorer Ian Rush is recovering in hospital after spending two days in intensive care with flu.

items.title: Wales and Liverpool icon Rush recovering in hospital from flu
items.summary: Liverpool's all-time leading goalscorer Ian Rush is recovering in hospital after spending two days in intensive care with flu.

items.title: Chargers explained - how to pick up the right phone charger
items.summary: The answer to the question â€œwhat charger should I use for my phone?â€ used to be simple â€“ the right charger came in the box. items.title: Composed Palmer back on the scoresheet as Chelsea return to winning ways
items.summary: Chelsea have moved back into the top four after defeating Everton as Cole Palmer scored for the first time since returning from injury.

items.title: Ekitike brace gives Liverpool important win as Salah returns
items.summary: Hugo Ekitike is decisive in an important two goal win over Brighton, as Mohamed Salah marks his eagerly awaited Liverpool return with an assist.

items.title: Arsenal score dramatic late winner to avoid Wolves upset
items.summary: Arsenal needed a second own goal after conceding in the 90th minute to defeat bottom of the table Wolves in a enthralling end to the match.

items.title: Wilson stars as Fulham inflict seventh consecutive defeat on Burnley
items.summary: Burnley lose crucial clash as Harry Wilson continues his fine form to send Fulham seven points clear of the drop zone.

items.title: Dominant Cyborg submits Collins & calls out Ditcheva
items.summary: Cris Cyborg puts in another dominant performance as she submits Sara Collins to retain her featherweight title at at PFL Lyon, before calling out Briton Dakota Ditcheva.

items.title: Cardiff stun Ulster with last-gasp Sheedy penalty
items.summary: Cardiff fly-half Callum Sheedy kicks a last-gasp winning penalty to defeat Ulster 29-26 in a Challenge Cup thriller at the Arms Park.

items.title: 'A joke' - Garnett disbelief at 44-second stoppage loss

items.summary: Dell's commercial sales department is set to announce a wave of price hikes affecting RAM, storage, GPU, and monitor upgrades to all corporate clients starting on December 17, according to leaked internal documents.

items.summary: OnePlus has released the OxygenOS 16.0.2.401 update for the OnePlus 15. It comes with the December 2025 Android security patch and adds a "Neon" filter to the default Camera app, recreating the CineStill 800T film effect. With the new update, the filter in the Photos app now supports "Motion Photo,â€¦

items.title: England dominate Jamaica in series opener
items.summary: England beat Jamaica 80-37 in the opening game of their two-match international series.

items.summary: Oracle reportedly delays some of the data centers for OpenAI from 2027 to 2028, citing labor and materials shortages.

items.title: ZTE Pad X1102N tablet launches in Europe with 5G support
items.summary: ZTE has introduced a new tablet in Europe, specifically in the Polish market for now - but it might spread to other countries as well soon. Meet the ZTE Pad X1102N. It comes with an 11-inch 1920x1200 LCD touchscreen with a 90Hz refresh rate, a 13 MP rear camera, a 5 MP front camera, and a 7,670 mAhâ€¦

items.title: Jump on $740 worth of hardware, including $410 worth of DDR5 RAM, in this $480 Newegg AM5 bundle â€” 32GB offering also includes an X870E motherboard and even a free 240mm AIO cooler

items.title: Intel Core Ultra 7 270K Plus and Core Ultra 9 290K Plus spotted at Indian retailer â€” listings appear to corroborate prior leaks but don't reveal pricing or new info for upcoming Arrow Lake refresh
items.summary: We've gotten our first retail appearance of the Arrow Lake refresh family, listed at an Indian retailer but with barely any information. The specs mentioned seem regurgitated from existing media coverage and leaks, and there's no price, but at least the vendor is promising a 3-year warranty.

items.title: Cup final victory would 'validate' Celtic process for Nancy
items.summary: Celtic manager Wilfried Nancy says victory in Sunday's Premier Sports Cup final against St Mirren would "validate" what he is trying to implement at his new club.

items.title: Huawei's latest mobile is armed with China's most advanced process node to date despite using blacklisted chipmaker â€” Huawei Kirin 9030 mobile SoC made on SMIC N+3 process, but can't compete with 5nm node
items.summary: TechInsights says Huawei's Kirin 9030 is built on SMICâ€™s N+3 process: an incremental, DUV-based extension of its 7nm-class technology that pushes density without EUV but falls well short of true 5nm nodes amid rising yield challenges.

items.title: The $2,400 Samsung Galaxy Z TriFold sold out in minutes
items.summary: The Samsung Galaxy Z TriFold, announced last week, went on sale in South Korea today. It's priced at KRW3,590,400, which translates to $2,428 at current exchange rates. Despite its hefty price tag and being a first-gen product, the Galaxy Z TriFold sold out in minutes at all locations where it was â€¦

items.title: Photonic latch memory could enable optical processor caches that run up to 60 GHz, twenty times faster than standard caches â€” optical SRAM stores and outputs data entirely as light, but density challenges remain

items.title: vivo S50 online listing reveals complete specs
items.summary: The vivo S50 series is set to debut in China in the coming days. Ahead of the launch, the S50 has appeared on the China Telecom website, revealing its complete specifications. For starters, the vivo S50 will be powered by the Snapdragon 8s Gen 3 chipset, which will be paired with up to 16GB of RAM â€¦

items.title: 'A Mourinho move' - Prior defends McCullum after criticism

items.title: Honor Win series leaks ahead of imminent launch
items.summary: Honor was expected to launch its GT 2 series gaming phones soon, but there seems to be a slight change of plans. items.summary: Today, we have with us the OnePlus 15R, the sidekick to the flagship OnePlus 15 launched last month.
